name: SoundStorm
description:
A Shoot 'em Up with music driven gameplay. Feel the music and enjoy the unique shmup experience combining patterns and rhythms.



Bullets flash to the rythm of the music. Hit the bullets exactly on the beat to destroy them and make chain reactions. Soundstorm combines the intuitive gameplay of music games with the gameplay of tactical shooter games.

Every of the 6 stages is a well crafted unique piece of art. Each stage has it's own graphics, music and gameplay. No enemy, background or music is reused. Enemies patterns and backgrounds change every minute. The score mechanic keep you come back again and again. The combination of visual and auditory senses make Soundstorm an exciting experience of flow. Most people felt excited and cheerful after testing this shmup.

Keyboard, Gamepad, Mouse and Touch controls.

You will probably like SoundStorm if you also like:
  • Maximum of excitement in a minimum of time.
  • Audiovisual perfectly crafted psychedelic experiences.
  • Interesting gameplay straight to the point: No repetitions, no story, no grinding... just pure gameplay.
  • Innovative unique gameplay mechanics
  • Music games
  • Bullet hell shoot em ups
  • Tactical shoot 'em ups
  • Games that Trigger all your senses.

You probably won't like SoundStorm if you like the following
  • Extensive stories and long campaign
  • Collectables and side quests
  • Open World with many objectives to kill your time
